Name: Celebration (by Grzegorz Nowicki)
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass TOP with prosecco. *Special ingredient #1 : Pineapple cordial made by blending 900g of pineapple flesh with 450g of simple syrup (1:1.5) and straining through a cheesecloth; add 4g tartaric acid.
Review: A splash of prosecco adds vitality to what is a simple, but beautifully balanced rum and pineapple cocktail.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Grzegorz Nowicki at 6 Cocktails, Warsaw, Poland.
Nutrition: One serving of Celebration (by Grzegorz Nowicki) contains 142 calories
